verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> When I bring the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on a <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H7097>among<s%> <S%H5414>them,<s%> and set him for their <S%H6822>watchman;<s%>
<S%H7200>if,<s%> when he sees the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> he <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

then <S%H8085>whoever<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H2094>doesn't<s%> take warning, if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and take him <S%H3947>away,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

He <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H2094>didn't<s%> take warning; his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on <S%H2094>him;<s%> whereas if he had taken warning, he would have <S%H4422>delivered<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But if the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H8628>doesn't<s%> blow the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2094>aren't<s%> warned, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> from among <S%H3947>them;<s%> he is taken away in his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> at the <S%H6822>watchman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So <S%H1121>you,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and give them warning from <S%H2094>me.<s%>

When I <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4191>man,<s%> you shall surely <S%H4191>die,<s%> and you <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H1870>way;<s%> that <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H2094>Nevertheless,<s%> if you warn the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H7725>it,<s%> and he doesn't turn from his <S%H1870>way;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> Thus you <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> and our <S%H2403>sins<s%> are on <S%H4743>us,<s%> and we pine away in <S%H2421>them;<s%> how then can we live?

<S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H2416>them,<s%> As I live, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> but that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H7725>turn,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways;<s%> for why will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H6588>disobedience;<s%> and as for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> he shall not <S%H3782>fall<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H7562>wickedness;<s%> neither shall he who is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H2398>sins.<s%>

When I <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> that he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%> if he <S%H982>trust<s%> to his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> none of his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> deeds shall be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but in his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> therein shall he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H559>Again,<s%> when I say to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> if he <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%>

if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> give <S%H7999>again<s%> that which he had taken by <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H6213>committing<s%> no <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

None of his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> against <S%H6213>him:<s%> he has done that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal:<s%> but as for <S%H1870>them,<s%> their way is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%>
When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> he shall even die <S%H4191>therein.<s%>
When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> he shall live <S%H2421>thereby.<s%>

Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of you after his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2568>month,<s%> in the fifth day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that one who had <S%H6412>escaped<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, The <S%H5892>city<s%> has been <S%H5221>struck.<s%>

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had been on me in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he who was <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and he had <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> until he <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I was no more <S%H481>mute.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> they who <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> those <S%H2723>waste<s%> places in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H259>one,<s%> and he <S%H3423>inherited<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> but we are <S%H7227>many;<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> us for <S%H4181>inheritance.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> You <S%H398>eat<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and shall you <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

You <S%H5975>stand<s%> on your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> you <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> of you <S%H2930>defiles<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> and shall you <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> surely those who are in the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and him who is in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H2416>animals<s%> to be <S%H398>devoured;<s%> and those who are in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> and in the <S%H4631>caves<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment;<s%> and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> so that none shall pass <S%H5674>through.<s%>

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I have <S%H5414>made<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment,<s%> because of all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

As for <S%H1121>you,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H681>of<s%> you by the <S%H7023>walls<s%> and in the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2297>one<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Please <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> what is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H935>come<s%> to you as the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3996>come,<s%> and they <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you as my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but <S%H6213>don't<s%> do <S%H6310>them;<s%> for with their mouth they <S%H6213>show<s%> much <S%H5690>love,<s%> but their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1215>gain.<s%>

<S%H5690>Behold,<s%> you are to them as a very lovely <S%H7892>song<s%> of one who has a <S%H3303>pleasant<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and can play <S%H2895>well<s%> on an <S%H5059>instrument;<s%> for they <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they <S%H6213>don't<s%> do them.
When this comes to <S%H935>pass,<s%> <S%H935>(behold,<s%> it comes), then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has been among <S%H8432>them.<s%>
